title: Bug 108822 - More efficient disk sorting logic needed for border values in row
description: The current disk sorting logic does not handle border values for the row properly
OB: The current disk sorting logic does not properly sort the data when there is a border value for the row
EB: A more efficient logic is expected to process disk sorting when there is a border value for the row. The data should be sorted directly in memory and then written to the file
SR: To reproduce the issue, copy the file to the destination folder and observe the incorrect sorting of the data when there is a border value for the row. The expected behavior is to have a more efficient logic that directly sorts the data in memory and then writes it to the file
